topics.body:
Just discovered "these":http://www.iamelemental.com feminist action figures. They look like pretty badass little figures honestly. I'd argue with some of the reasoning behind them [spoiler]> implying male super hero action figures aren't also hypersexualized as all fuck[/spoiler] but I can't argue with well made lady action figures. They're a real minority in toys. 

But the reason I bring these up is that if I get any, they're totally going on my shelf as humanized power ponies. Or at very least the "honesty" one. You can't tell me that thing's not rainbow dash with a sunburn.

topics.body:
My parents are convinced that Grand Theft Auto is the root of all evil. Seriously, the news station they're watching have covered E3 three times now, and every time the _very name_ of the series is stated, the air gets heavy, my mom rolls her eyes in disgust, and my dad whispers "Grand Theft Auto" under his breath.

Along on their shitlist is: Family Guy, South Park, M-Rated games in general, and Bratz dolls. All of which I've encountered and enjoyed at least once or twice in my life.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442
